name: Bridge
description: A stone bridge arcs across a waterway. A shadowy figure lurks under the bridge, only its gleaming eyes clearly visible. This card reflects the effort required to overcome obstacles.

person.upright: A mediator who enjoys helping others overcome misunderstandings or grievances.
person.reverse: A person who is part of a longstanding feud between two families or groups.

creatureTrap.upright: Someone who coordinates the efforts of different kinds of creatures, such as a mind flayer mastermind using grimlocks and trolls as agents.
creatureTrap.reverse: A creature that lairs near, on, or under a bridge and either collects tolls from those using the bridge or tries to eat them.

place.upright: A bridge across a river or chasm.
place.reverse: A river or chasm with no bridge, or where the bridge is unsafe or has collapsed.

treasure.upright: An art object depicting a bridge, or a magic item intended to help overcome obstacles (such as Boots of Striding and Springing).
treasure.reverse: An art object depicting walls, barriers. or a labyrinth; alternatively, a magic item that creates magical walls (such as a Cube of Force).

situation.upright: An urgent need for bridges between long-opposed factions.
situation.reverse: Open conflict between two families or groups.
